item.title: Moved to University of Toyama
item.description: April 1st 2022 Moved to University of Toyama. I will work on mathematical modeling and data analysis in the field of pharmacology. lab introduction in a website of School of Pharmacy and Pharmaceutical Sciences, University of Toyama.
